dct_title_s: Novissima et Accuratissima TOTIUS AMERICÆ DESCRIPTIO
dct_description_sm: North Pacific (map upper left) is blank.
Vignette of Poseidon and sea creatures in upper left. Additional artwork added to seas overall.

California as a large island of Briggs type, with nearly flat northern coast. C. Mendocino is northern-most point on California. Anian and Straet Anian to northeast. Partial outline of Zelandia Nova to far southwest. Cartography and title cartouche based on Visscher's map of 1670. And is very similar to DeWit's 1670 map, Ogilby's 1671 map, and Meursius map of [1671-73].

Issued in: De nieuwe en onbekende weereld of beschrijving van America... / A. Montanus; by Jacob Meurs, 1671. Issued in: Atlas minor sive geographia compendiosa, qua orbis terrarum, per paucas attamen novissimas tabulas ostenditur / Amstelædami, N. Visscher, [1690?].
